definition: to pass on/to spread/to transmit/to infect/to transfer/to circulate/to conduct (electricity)

sentences.english: One idea being floated is to take the firm private.
sentences.chinese: 私有化是目前風傳的一個想法。

sentences.english: From Africa, Trans-Atlantic winds bring dust resulting from persistent droughts.
sentences.chinese: 從亞洲由大西洋風傳送導致長時間的乾旱。

sentences.english: Pollen is carried to the pistil by wind.
sentences.chinese: 花粉通過風傳播到雌蕊上。
